entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone Harry calls out to. He is also the one who gets hit by the motorbike.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person with red eyes, preparing to curse Harry. He disappears suddenly.

entities.name: selwyn
entities.description: Selwyn is mentioned as someone who has a wand and is asked by Voldemort to give it to him.

relationships.description: Harry feels Voldemort before he sees him, indicating that they are close to each other. However, Voldemort disappears suddenly.
The motorbike driven by Harry crashes into Hagrid, who is lying on the ground below him.
